955440.name: Jam Studio VR  -- Music Fundamentals Series
955440.description:
This DLC includes the following interactive learning songs that teach a broad range of basic music principles. These songs are great to introduce anyone, at any age, to music fundamentals.

Music Fundamentals Series - 02 - Major
Music Fundamentals Series - 03 - Minor
Music Fundamentals Series - 04 - Chords
Music Fundamentals Series - 05 - Melody
Music Fundamentals Series - 06 - ALL
Music Fundamentals Series - GAME
955440.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
